mapper.insert: insert into article_info (srcdatabase, title, author, organ, source, keyword, summary, pubtime, firstduty, fund, year, pagecount, clc, url, doi, custom_concept1, custom_concept2, custom_concept3) values (#{srcDatabase}, #{title}, #{author}, #{organ}, #{source}, #{keyword}, #{summary}, #{pubTime}, #{firstDuty}, #{fund}, #{year}, #{pageCount}, #{clc}, #{url}, #{doi}, #{customConcept1}, #{customConcept2}, #{customConcept3})
mapper.select:
select * from article_info
and title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
